name: Year Income Report
query:
SELECT 
    IFNULL(employee, 'Total') AS employee,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 1 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS January_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 2 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS February_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 3 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS March_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 4 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS April_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 5 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS May_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 6 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS June_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 7 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS July_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 8 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS August_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 9 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS September_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 10 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS October_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 11 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS November_Salary,
    SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(start_date) = 12 THEN net_pay ELSE 0 END) AS December_Salary,
    SUM(net_pay) AS Monthly_Total
FROM
    (SELECT employee, net_pay, start_date 
     FROM `tabSalary Slip` 
     WHERE status = 'Submitted') AS salary_slips
WHERE YEAR(start_date) = YEAR(CURDATE())
GROUP BY employee WITH ROLLUP;
